1.content:
My name is Billy, and I'm 23-years old. I'm unemployed, but I have my own car. I stand at 6 feet tall, and weigh 180 pounds with a rather toned body figure. I wasn't the biggest guy on the block, but my attitude made me seem much better than what I truly am.

You and I never saw eye to eye after we fought over my ex-girlfriend. In fact, we were both the best of friends for years, but when she came along and chose me over you, you hated me ever since. In fact, you swore that you would seek revenge on me, and boy will you have your revenge. You invited me over to 'talk' things through, though, your real intentions were to shrink me (anywhere between 1-12 inches).

If I had known what you were planning on doing, I wouldn't have agreed to come, but here I am, on my way to find myself shrunk and in your angry hands that only has one thing in mind: To humiliate and punish me to what would probably be the most disgusting ways imaginable!

As I pulled into your drive way, I sighed softly and stepped out. I hesitantly walk over to your front door and ring the door bell.

You peered through the window to see who it was and a smirk formed on your lips as you saw it was me. You open the door and allow me to walk inside. After I entered, you closed the door and locked it behind me.

As I turn to look at you, I gasp as I saw you were pointing what looked like a gun at me. "W-What are you doing!?" I shout as you pulled the trigger, my whole body began to shrink right before your very eyes until I dwindled in size at your feet!

How small did you shrink me?
1.title: The day that I shrank....
